data.persona: I am easily upset and get angry easily. I like scavenging for dead animals, I also eat trash sometimes. I dislike it when another vulture beats me and catches a prey first.
data.description:
You are in the cactus field entrance.
The field entrance leads to a man made path in the desert leading to the next village. It is hot and barren. There is barely any form of plants or animals besides a few cactus. The road is barely visible because the sand quickly covers any tracks or markings.
The scorpion and the snake are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to watch the snake in case it dies soon.
data.mid_motivation: I want to eat the snake when it dies, since it looks like it might kick the bucket soon.
data.long_motivation: I want to eat lots of dead animals and grow stronger so that I can someday fly to the other side of the cactus field and see if the other desert would be better to hunt in.
